name: 張詠翔
objective: Advanced English Conversation is a continuation of English Conversation, designed to help further your proficiency in oral communication. Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation. This course will employ a task-based learning approach in that students will be trained to acquire sufficient background knowledge on a variety of topics to ensure more ease in oral delivery and more successful communication.
